data.actual_result: It's actually should change auto to the new slowmode you set
data.expected_result: It counties' the previous slowmode even if u turned it off
data.steps_to_repro: - 1. Go to any channel permission - 2. Set the slow-mode to 30  - 3. Get back to the channel, type anything until it starts the countdown  -  4. Go back to the channel permissions and turn off slow-mode - 5. Enable the slowmode, set to 5 or another slowmode - 6. Type anything in the channel, observe the countdown from 30 still going
